tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE merchant_information ( 
  merchant_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  merchant_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
  merchant_address TEXT, 
  merchant_phone TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_price DECIMAL,
    product_description VARCHAR(255),
    merchant_id UUID REFERENCES merchants(merchant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  merchant_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  order_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE merchant_info (
    merchant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    merchant_name VARCHAR(255),
    merchant_email VARCHAR(255),
    merchant_address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE merchant_products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_price DECIMAL,
    merchant_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE merchant_orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    merchant_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE merchant_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_rating INT,
    merchant_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE order_info (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date TIMESTAMP,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    merchant_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (merchant_id) REFERENCES merchant_info(merchant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_info (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount_paid DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id, order_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES order_info(order_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_info (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    customer_email VARCHAR(255),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(20),
    customer_address VARCHAR(255)
);
